Credit card (Visa, Eurocard/Master card, Amex, and switch or Visa/Delta) Payment can be accepted ONLY through PayPal (you don't need a PayPal account). Please make payment within 3 days of purchase. We offer fast dispatch on all items. Orders placed and paid before 10pm will be shipped the next day. Shipping to the UK I send out by first class recorded mail so usually you will receive order next day. It can take up to 3 days though Royal mail Express next day 1pm and 9am delivery is available for an extra charge. Shipping to the E.U We use royal mail international signed for and the delivery aim for this service is 3 days. Shipping to the rest of the world We use royal mail international signed for and the delivery aim for this service is 5 days. Recorded delivery All Recorded items that we send out require signature on delivery. Tracking numbers will be sent to the customer on request. Online tracking for UK & Northern Ireland customers is available at www.royalmail.com. We only accept returns if item is returned as new with all original packaging we sent it out to you with. We will happily refund the full price of the item once its been returned and checked. We will only refund postage if its are fault or item arrives damaged or faulty. The item must be returned to us, in its original condition, within 30 days of you purchasing it. For all returns please contact us via eBay messages or call 07791947818. We only accept returns if item is returned as new with all original packaging we sent it out to you with. We will happily refund the full price of the item once its been returned and checked. We will only refund postage if its are fault or item arrives damaged or faulty.

The item must be returned to us, in its original condition, within 30 days of you purchasing it. For all returns please contact us via eBay messages or call 07791947818.

If you wish to return your items we insist you send it signed for recorded delivery and keep note of the tracking number. Parcels that do not arrive back to us cannot be refunded by us so this is why we advice recorded delivery. Send it back to the return address on invoice sent with your order.
